data.text: Mene ɔbarima a mahunu amane
Wapam me afiri ne ho ama manante
Ampa ara wama nsa so atia me
Wama me wedeɛ ne me nam anyini
Waka me ahyɛ mu,
Wama matena esum mu
Wato ɔfasuo atwa me ho ahyia enti mentumi nnwane;
Mpo sɛ mefrɛ anaasɛ mebɔ mpaeɛ srɛ mmoa a
Ɔde abotan asi me ɛkwan;
Te sɛ sisi a ɔda hɔ retwɛn,
ɔtwee me firi ɛkwan no mu dwerɛɛ me
Ɔkuntunuu ne tadua mu
Ɔde bɛmma a ɛfiri ne kotokuo mu
Meyɛɛ asredeɛ maa me nkurɔfoɔ nyinaa;
Ɔde nhahan nwononwono ahyɛ me ma.
Ɔde aboseaa abubu me se;
Wɔama asomdwoeɛ abɔ me;
Enti mese, “Mʼanimuonyam asa,
Mekae mʼamanehunu wɔ mʼakyinkyini mu,
Mekae yie,
Nanso, mekae yei
Awurade dɔ kɛseɛ enti yɛnnsɛeɛ.
Ɛyɛ foforɔ anɔpa biara;
Meka kyerɛ me ho sɛ,
Awurade yɛ ma wɔn a wɔn anidasoɔ wɔ ne mu,
Ɛyɛ sɛ wɔyɛ komm
Ɛyɛ ma ɔbarima sɛ ɔsoa kɔnnua no
Ma ɔntena ase komm,
Ma ɔmfa nʼanim nsie wɔ mfuturo mu,
Ma ɔmfa nʼafono mma deɛ ɔpɛɛ sɛ ɔbɔ no
Na Awurade nto nnipa ntwene koraa.
Ɛwom, ɔde awerɛhoɔ ba deɛ, nanso ɔbɛnya ayamhyehyeɛ.
Ɔfiri amemenemfe mu de amanehunu
Sɛ wɔde wɔn nan dwerɛ
sɛ wɔtiatia obi ahofadie so
anaa sɛ wɔbu obi ntɛnkyea a,
Hwan na ɔbɛtumi aka na wama aba mu
Ɛnyɛ Ɔsorosoroni no anom
Adɛn enti na ɛsɛ sɛ ɔteasefoɔ nwiinwii
Momma yɛnhwehwɛ yɛn akwan mu na yɛnsɔ nhwɛ,
Momma yɛmma yɛn akoma ne yɛn nsa so,
“Yɛayɛ bɔne, na yɛate atua
“Wode abufuo akata wo ho ataa yɛn;
Wode wo ho asie omununkum mu
Woayɛ yɛn atantanneɛ ne wira
“Yɛn atamfoɔ nyinaa abae wɔn anom tɛtrɛɛ
Yɛabrɛ ne ahunahuna ne akukuruhweaseɛ,
Me nisuo sene sɛ asutene
Me nisuo bɛsene ara,
kɔsi sɛ Awurade bɛhwɛ
Deɛ mehunu no ma me kra werɛ ho
Mʼatamfoɔ a menyɛɛ wɔn hwee
Wɔpɛɛ sɛ wɔtwa me nkwa so
nsuo bu faa me tiri so,
Mebɔɔ wo din, Ao Awurade
Wotee me sufrɛ: “Nsi wʼaso
Wotwe bɛnee me ɛberɛ a mefrɛɛ woɔ no,
Ao Awurade, wodii mʼasɛm maa me;
Woahunu bɔne a wɔayɛ me, Ao Awurade.
Woahunu wɔn aweretɔ no mu den,
Ao Awurade, woate wɔn sopa,
deɛ mʼatamfoɔ ka no sɛ asomusɛm na wɔka no brɛoo
Hwɛ wɔn! Sɛ wɔgyinagyina hɔ anaa sɛ wɔtete hɔ,
Fa deɛ ɛfata tua wɔn so ka, Ao Awurade,
Pirim wɔn akoma,
Fa abufuo taa wɔn, na sɛe wɔn
